name: flushable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
able to be got rid of down the toilet: Wipe up the spill with flushable paper and dispose of it in the toilet. We use nappies with a flushable liner.
(of a toilet) able to be flushed (= emptied then filled with water again): Beneath the stairs there is a flushable toilet.
More examplesFewer examplesEven flushable wipes can clog up the sewers.Are sanitary napkins flushable? In one corner of the cell is a flushable toilet built into the concrete floor.Some companies rent deluxe portable restrooms, which include flushable toilets and other amenities rarely associated with mobile toilets.
